# DuckDB + Streamlit : Crafting Dynamic Dashboards and Data Apps

2024/02/15

Want to create dynamic dashboards and data apps with your DuckDB data? Learn from Streamlit Developer Advocate Chanin Natasenamat and Mehdi in this Quack and Code episode.
